projects.title: Energy Efficient College Building
projects.subtitle: Integrated planning, analysis, design & energy optimisation
projects.role: Final year B.Tech project – BIM, analysis & documentation
projects.summary: A complete BIM-based workflow for an energy-efficient educational building – from site study, planning and structural analysis to energy optimisation and estimation.
highlights: Full BIM model created as single source of truth.
Energy performance studied and design decisions adjusted for efficiency.
Followed NBC, KMBR and relevant IS codes for planning and design.
Generated coordinated drawings, schedules and quantity estimates.

projects.title: XTASY 2K24 – College Arts Fest Website
projects.subtitle: Event website for St. Thomas CET arts fest
projects.summary: A responsive event website for XTASY 2K24, built to publish schedules, highlight events and give students a single place to track updates.
highlights: Clean, fast static website deployed on GitHub Pages.
Clear navigation for events, rules and schedules.
Designed to match the fest branding and theme.

projects.title: Project DASP – Final Year Project Website
projects.subtitle: Public-facing site for project documentation
projects.summary: A simple, focused website created to present the final year project concept, team and documentation to external viewers.
highlights: Provided a clean online presence for the project.
Easy navigation for abstract, methodology and media.
Helps external reviewers quickly understand the work.
